dialogue.introduction: I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser. Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.
dialogue.library_intro: First of the Katori-class training cruisers, Katori. Right, leave the ocean navigation training to me. I believe I'll be a great help in furthering what the fleet attains out of it's drills, for sure. Eh, my firepower in comparison to a battleship... is it? I wonder, tactics-wise, how it is.
dialogue.secretary2: Should I go on ocean navigation training?
dialogue.secretary3: Ara... Hoho...? I see. Looks like you need a little discipline...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Preparing for the next ocean voyage...alright! I'll be thorough. Admiral...oh, you're busy...Well, I, uh...I guess it's no matter.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, is there something wrong? Are you tired? If that's so, would you like to go to a sea a little faraway with Katori? When this battle is over, for sure...
dialogue.wedding: What may it be, Admiral? For you to personally summon this Katori... Eh...? Th-thank you very much! I'll... gracefully receive it.
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, you want a situation report? That's very important; the report is right here.
dialogue.equipment1: An upgrade for Katori? I'm very thankful.
dialogue.equipment2: Yeah, my armaments are actually that heavy. Ufufu.
dialogue.supply: Thanks. From now on, I can navigate the ocean at any time.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It's not a big problem but... My clothes got ripped a bit...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Well, please excuse me then. I will head to the bath first.
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral, looks like we have a new important ship girl for ocean navigation.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. Good work everyone.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Ocean navigating fleet's flagship Katori, going! Everyone, please follow me!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet sighted! Artillery, commence fire!
dialogue.attack: Somehow... in the shelling phase... something inside my head... Wait, I need to focus on the battle. FIRE!
dialogue.night_battle: A night battle!? How interesting... Let's do it! Please, follow me.
dialogue.night_attack: These guns and torpedoes are not just for show. Now, see the results of our daily training!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: These guns and torpedoes are not just for show. Now, see the results of our daily training!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: These guns and torpedoes are not just for show. Now, see the results of our daily training!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: These guns and torpedoes are not just for show. Now, see the results of our daily training!
dialogue.mvp: Of course, the result from this ocean navigation will not betray us. What about you, Admiral?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Arghhhh! I can still fight! Don't worry!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I'm beat... But my gun still works... I'll rain shells on them!
dialogue.sunk: It's...no good... At least, I got launched...aa..ah...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Um.... Here, would you perhaps want to eat this? Yes, it is a chocolate cake. Please enjoy it.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is a important day. Katori is happy to be with you on such a day!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Summer has come again, hasn't it? The destroyers are really excited. Admiral, how about a swim?
dialogue.fall_2015: Admiral, it's got a bit chilly. Autumn... are you going to spend this autumn with reading, admiral?
dialogue.christmas_2015: It's Christmas, Admiral. It's a little bit romantic... it makes me want to put up some illumination.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Well then, it's New Year Eve. Whether it's the fleet or naval base, let's wash out this one year's worth of filth. Spring cleaning, was it?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Surely, we'll sail the seas together again this year, won't we?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Luck in! Demons out! ...ufufu, going back to such childish things, it's quite fun, Admiral!

hourly.0000: Today, Training Cruiser Katori will be your secretary, right? Admiral, I'll be in your care.
hourly.0100: 01:00. It's hard to believe how quiet this port becomes at night... During the day, it was so noisy...
hourly.0200: 02:00. Tomorrow will come soon. How about some rest, Admiral?
hourly.0300: 03:00. Admiral? You should lie down and rest. Leave the rest of the work to me.
hourly.0400: 04:00. Admiral? It's almost dawn. It's the darkest before dawn, right? Ufufu~
hourly.0500: 05:00. Admiral, it's already morning. Shall I brew a strong tea? Is coffee better for you?
hourly.0600: 06:00. It's time to reveille for the fleet, Admiral? Reveille!
hourly.0700: 07:00. What do you want for breakfast? Then, one toast with warm coffee and fruit for you, right?
hourly.0800: 08:00. Time for the fleet to work! First is some expeditions, right? While we're at it, should we add some...ocean navigation?
hourly.0900: 09:00. Ah... But if I were to navigate the ocean then... Who would be here with you...? Th-That's right, let's do it another time.
hourly.1000: 10:00. About the torpedo squadron... Oh, this expedition is ok? And this is... Oh, we need to resupply, too... what should we do about development?
hourly.1100: 11:00. Admiral... Thank you very much! I was nervous at things I'm not familiar with but... I'll get used to it soon.
hourly.1200: 12:00. What shall we eat for lunch? Can I do it as long as it's simple?
hourly.1300: 13:00. Do you want more of Katori's curry? It's different from others' curry, right? Ufufufu
hourly.1400: 14:00. Ara? What's wrong, Maikaze? It's a little lonely...? Nowaki is not with you today?
hourly.1500: 15:00. Huh...about Maikaze? She's such a good girl! Of course, Nowaki is too.
hourly.1600: 16:00. What? Ah...about this? It's not a main gun, it's a ceremonial saluting gun... Shall I shoot it?
hourly.1700: 17:00. The sun is about to set... Let us return to the base.
hourly.1800: 18:00. Good work today, Admiral. What do you wish for your dinner? Fufu... Roger that! I shall now prepare.
hourly.1900: 19:00. Now then, eat up! It's different from Ashigara's, right? How does it taste?
hourly.2000: 20:00. Can you wait, Admiral? I'm washing at the moment... Ara... It's as if we are a married couple... Ufufu
hourly.2100: 21:00. Admiral? Is there a problem? You're putting on such a troubled face... 'Don't worry'? We're always with you, Admiral.
hourly.2200: 22:00. Guu... That girl is being noisy again, today! Don't stop me, Admiral! I'm gonna teach her a lesson!
hourly.2300: 23:00. Night time is here. Good work, Admiral. Shall we have some sake? And then good night.
